website_summaries.verdict: These lightweight, affordable shoe trees are adjustable to fit all men's shoe sizes between 5.5 and 11.5.
pros: We love how easy to use and adjust they are
They're much lighter than wooden shoe trees, so they're great for traveling
cons: Can snap if you put too much pressure on them

customer_reviews.title: This is a new must have for your kids extremely expensive shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his shoes, so when he’d asked me if I’d purchase these to take care of his shoes. Well it was a no brainer, as his shoes are $250 bucks and I’ll definitely spend this amount to help him protect and take care of his shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Useable but Unrefined
customer_reviews.text: Be careful handling these shoe trees, the ends of the metal adjustment bars along with several of the plastic pieces have not been finished and are sharp/jagged. Plastic feels cheap but price reflects that. Update: noticed that the molding lines jutting out of the plastic heels of these trees were actually abrading the leather on the inside heel of my dress shoes as I inserted and removed them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: If your a sneakerhead or somebody who like to take care of your shoes this is a must have. They help with creasing, reshaping and even cleaning if you have a pair of mesh/non leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a decently made product. I use the ones that you have to snap down instead of the spring ones and they get the job done well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling with nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my purposes. I have to travel often for work and my suitcase has ruined many pairs of nice leather shoes. The wooden shoe trees are too heavy to pack in a suitcase, so these were a convenient lightweight option for travel. I highly recommend them if you are having to pack nice shoes! They fit my size 13 shoes nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: My constant travel companion
customer_reviews.text: It was a smart decision to get this for my expensive dress shoes. I am always carrying these with me on all my trips nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Bodhi Ganguli

customer_reviews.title: shoe trees
customer_reviews.text: These work well with my shoes to keep them in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Kish

customer_reviews.title: One broken
customer_reviews.text: One broke as I was installing (in last hole) size 10
customer_reviews.author: Annette Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after my first use
customer_reviews.text: TWO of my shoe trees snapped the first time I used them. I place them firmly in my shoes, came back and both of them had broke, super disappointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Broke Immediately
customer_reviews.text: These broke the first time I tried to use them. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell W.

customer_reviews.title: Work great as boot "stretchers."
customer_reviews.text: Work great to keep boots "stretched" if they are a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: They only fit a certain size , good use still though
customer_reviews.author: Ojxda

customer_reviews.title: Only1 of 2 pair pack arrived.
customer_reviews.text: There was only 1 pair inside this 2 pair pack.
customer_reviews.author: I Like Toterz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They’re pretty easy to use but they’re a little flimsy. They get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: even though it's mate worked perfectly fine on the other shoe at the same adjustment setting
customer_reviews.text: Well, they mostly worked except for the one that broke as I inserted it, even though it's mate worked perfectly fine on the other shoe at the same adjustment setting. Easy to break. I urge caution.
customer_reviews.author: A. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoe trees primarily for my golf shoes. I play golf often and when I finish my round I used these shoe trees to keep my shoes stretched out. 1st of all the maximum length of these will only fit a size 11. That puts these flimsy trees at the last adjustment holes. I've already broke all of them even though I tried to be careful. I would say that even if you used them on a smaller size shoe they wouldn't last long. Maybe if you stored your shoes with these trees and didn't remove them often they would be of some value.
customer_reviews.author: Bert105

customer_reviews.title: Great for dress shoes or leathers.
customer_reviews.text: These work great and stretch out my shoes nicely. I am not sure how long they will last though. The back part where the metal hooks into to be able to adjust it flexes every time I set them in place. I can see them breaking eventually because of this. But for the price they do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Tony10

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't surprised as they are plastic and fairly weak but they were cheap I didn't expect much. They did work long enough to stretch the heal of my doc martens though, so they did the job, but only lasted a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Barb C

customer_reviews.title: Fits All!
customer_reviews.text: One Size fits all! I use these for my boat shoes and boots- keeps them from deforming!
customer_reviews.author: Blythe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 days of use.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these but they’re crap. Broke on me after only a few days of use. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Work as described
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to do. Have had for a few months and haven’t had any issues. Good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Trees are Shoe Trees
customer_reviews.text: I purchased replacements for some that wore out. Good as new now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Morris

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: amazing product! does just what it says and keeps my shoes in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be very cautious
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on sizing. Too much pressure and it broke instantly
customer_reviews.author: Andres Medrano

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. You know, they're cheap products, but should last a lifetime if used properly.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.text: As a shoe collector i have purchased several different types and brands of shoe trees. Ive tried several different brands of expensive shoe tree and while they are great the price point is just to high. My solution was to try several reasonably price shoe trees and of all the ones ive tried these are by far the best bang for your buck! They are great quality and great for holding the shape of your shoes. i would recommend these shoe trees to anyone who has multiple pairs of shoes and would like to keep them in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: juan mercado

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, very lightweight, and one is broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoe trees was broken upon arrival. The heel knobs are much smaller than I expected, and since one is broken, it is unusable. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: These do the job, but you might want to wear gloves
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well, and honestly it's a pretty good design if you're trying to minimize cost. The downside is that the inexpensive mold leaves pretty sharp edges - particularly around the plastic loop that you use to pull them out of your shoes. Certainly not sharp enough to cut you but it's uncomfortable to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: You do have to be careful to not put too much tension on these shoe trees as one of them did snap as it was being put into the shoe. However, after contacting the seller for one replacement they immediately responded and more than adequately corrected the situation for me. All of the other ones worked fine when being put into the shoes and I look forward to using them on a regular basis. If set to the appropriate setting they seem adequate to provide the correct tension for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: EFreed

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Buy them. Dont waste money on reshoven8r shoe trees.
customer_reviews.text: Have u heard of reshoven8r? Or however their name is spelled... theirs sells for a lot of money for 1-2 pairs of these. Just buy these guys. Theyre the exact same quality. These last long and theyre great. In reshoven8r youre not paying for higher quality youre just paying more for the name. I did that mistake and then i bought these and these are wayyyy better because u get more shoe trees for the same quality and low cost.
customer_reviews.author: PhantomLord

customer_reviews.title: They’rrre(tony the tigers voice) great!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why some of you have had a bad experience but mine was great! I was careful to put them on and as a collector, I have many shoes and lose some of the cardboard shoes trees that some shoes come with but these are awesome. I will definently buy more and recommend these to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Vinales

customer_reviews.title: Rethink buying for nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoe trees are a good deal for the price, but I wear a size 11.5 and when I insert the shoe tree fully extended, I'm not all that satisfied that the shoe tree is filling enough of the toe to prevent collapse. There's more space in here than I would like. So if you're looking to use these to fill casual slippers, they're good, but I wouldn't recommend using these given their size for anything expensive that you want to preserve.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are better than some of the more expensive tress I purchased. The finish around the edges of the toe box supports have been smoothed to allow them to easily slide in and out of the shoes without damaging those potentially expensive kicks. I've switched all of my old trees out of my finer shoes because of that little detail.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my bowling shoes, and a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when the all-plastic trees that came with my bowling shoes finally gave out. I wish they were a tad wider, but adjustable length is most important. With two sets for the price of one, I gave the extra set to a teammate whose shoes were getting mercilessly crushed in her bag. They work equally well for her ladies' size 7s and my men's 10.5s. Months of use now, and still holding up like new.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Men's size 13 and up!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a men's size 13, which is a fairly standard size. So, I was quite surprised that these shoe trees provide little to no tension for my shoes, which is critical for them to do their job. All the other negative reviews are regarding quality of materials, flimsiness, or breaking. I find the quality and materials to be fine, but it is frustrating that I have to insert a folded sock or washcloth into each shoe for these to properly fit and provide adequate tension. I do not recommend these if you wear a size Men's 13 or above.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Value and Use in Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in addition to some cedar shoe trees. I found that these work great in my wife's boots and maybe for someone with larger shoes. But if you want great shoe trees with a decent aroma, I recommend getting cedar. But these are not bad. If you do not care for the real shoe trees, these do a decent job of retaining shoe shape and structure. But I would still recommend mostly boots.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: great for my dress shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I see folks ripping on these but I think they are great! I use these for all of my dress work shoes. They keep the shoe form and are super light. Used them to go to Vegas and barely added weight. I recommend only to keep the form of the shoe, not for stretching out the shoes. Like it so much I just ordered another set for my other 5 dress shoe pairs.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: These keep the shape of my shoe however they leave imprints on my insoles. Very noticeable when wearing. My fix was putting some thick old socks over the front part where the toebox is supported and this seems to help Works great Fits in all my shoes and has helped keep their shape Great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Suen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap alternative to expensive wooden shoe  trees
customer_reviews.text: As good as any plastic shoe trees I have purchased over the years. Good price and the product works as was expected. The only ones that were damaged were damaged by me stepping on them or trying to force the metal back into the slot when they came apart. But that was due to my clumsiness and impatience. Would love the wooden cedar trees but they are much too expensive and the end result is not that much differenen.
customer_reviews.author: MrWms

customer_reviews.title: Not what advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot smaller then I expected it says upto a size 12 but I think that’s in women’s sizing cause when I place them in my shoes they don’t even fill up have the toe box in a size 8 or 9 and that’s using them in yeezys and ultra boosts so just be alware of that when buying. I wanted to try out the plastic style ones but I dunno if it’ll be the same result so I haven’t ordered them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Drew tuTWENTY

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Much better then the one sized speing models you see from other companies. Takes to the shape of the shoe much better, withought cousing weird raises in the front of the shoe like others.
customer_reviews.author: RoxZilla

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for men’s shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are too narrow for men’s size 9.0->10.0, doesn’t come close to filling the sides. Using them for shoes at the bottom of the bin to stop them from being crushed, but that’s about their only purpose at this point. Easy to use, just not enough girth.
customer_reviews.author: mpls_og_digger

customer_reviews.title: the horns are very large
customer_reviews.text: the horns are very large, you really have to squeeze them into the shoes. The other cheap shoe horns I had were smaller and easier to squeeze into the shoe. I won't be using these for nice dress shoes, I'm afraid it would distort them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like... 😁
customer_reviews.text: I've only used wooden versions of these so I kind of for confused on how to lock it in. Figured it out fairly quickly though and it does exactly what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Buy the big pack! Save all your shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and price for 5 pairs was very reasonable. These were recommended off a Rothys Addicts Facebook page I am on.. and I am so glad I purchased! I hand washed my shoes and stuck these trees in them... they literally looked brand new! Perfect shape. So happy I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Anding

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 80 year old boss who didn't want to spend a lot of money on wooden shoe trees. He was very happy with them, and said he would purchase these same ones if he needs more. The only issue with them was that he couldn't figure out how to use them at first until someone figured it out for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kara T.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Put them in shoes once received. A month later went on business trip. After taking them out and putting them back in they all bent or broke (after the return date). Junk
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should especially for being cheaper than others
customer_reviews.text: Works as should the edges seem to be a little sharp could be more rounded other then than no issues
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Trees Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the same exact shoe trees but in a different brand and today i just got these products and it literally blow my mind. The shoe trees from this brand is literally solid and high quality which I've ever got. Nice packaging and high quality products. Thanks you.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Made CHEAP - All 5 pairs broke apart - DO NOT waste your $$$$ on these!!!
customer_reviews.text: The weight is perfect for travel, but after using just twice - the plastic part in the back will break apart rendering the piece useless. I had to wrap strips of duct tape around the plastic after they all broke apart so that would hold together. Great design and good promise - but cheap materials make this item a complete disaster. The metal will hold up and the front spreader is OK - but the most important part is in the back - and that is the weakest spot!! Dont waste your money on these trees until somebody makes the same design with better materials.....
customer_reviews.author: JGB

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the shape of my shoes and they always are ready to go without that familiar Elf curve. Great product, fast shipping, very economical way to save expensive dress, sports or running shoes. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Manny R

customer_reviews.title: These are small. Not for Bigfoot
customer_reviews.text: My bad, these are for shoes up to 11.5 US I am a 13. I did not read the whole description and assumed with all the adjustment holes pictured they would fit my shoes. Obviously made for the Asian market. Not for Bigfoot in the USA
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: I had a really good quality pair in the military
customer_reviews.text: Very very cheap plastic. I had a really good quality pair in the military. They would have stood up to most any boot. These barely stand up to a sock. Very disappointed. The plastic broke on 1st use.
customer_reviews.author: Master Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: The do what is expected just fine.
customer_reviews.text: The do what is expected just fine... bear in mind at $15 for a pack of 5, that comes out to $3 each so don't expect anything other than plastic. They work great to hold the shape of shoes, but if you plan to do some shoe stretching do yourself a favor and pickup some higher quality wooden shoe trees.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy shoe collector
customer_reviews.text: Once you realize how to use these and adapt the length for each shoe - they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your Bucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe trees for your not so expensive shoes. Adjustable size, and big bang for your bucks! Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MolonLabe

customer_reviews.title: Not flimsy at a;; as pthers suggest. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not flimsy at all as others suggested. You just can't twist it around as if it is construction machinery. Have had another set for years without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Fern

customer_reviews.title: For Sneakerheads
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck with these trees. Ive ordered them twice so far and theyre perfect for my jordans and dunks.
customer_reviews.author: DerekJ

customer_reviews.title: and some like this, that look exactly the same
customer_reviews.text: There is apparently a very common shoe tree style floating around, some of which are of manageable quality and I've had in the past, from whom I can't remember, and some like this, that look exactly the same, but aren't even worth the words I'm typing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price, works just fine in my extra pairs of shoes the ones I don't use the wooden trees in.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Hill

customer_reviews.title: As good as Ikea's - but direct to your door
customer_reviews.text: Ikea's version is still cheaper IF you purchase it at a B&M location. These are cheaper to your door than Ikea, if ordered online.
customer_reviews.author: Value Driven (cheaper isn't always better)

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Trees
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep my shoes from slumping while in storage. They do exactly that!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised. Excellent design and quality. Works better than cedarwood products which are more costly. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Used all 6 pairs for my work dress shoes and these made them look a lot fuller. Love them
customer_reviews.author: mattwong8

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets for my husbands shoes, he really liked them to keto his shoes in top notch shape
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Sweet

customer_reviews.title: they work better than expected and are firmer than expected
customer_reviews.text: they work better than expected and are firmer than expected. obvious not as nice as a cedar spit toe shoe tree as they do not have width adjustability or moisture absorption but for what they are they work really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a couple of months and would buy them again (except 5 pairs will last me a while). I've had no issues with them breaking; they're easy to adjust and they keep my shoes in top shape.
customer_reviews.author: Craig In Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Depends on the purpose. If you are looking to just hold the shape of the shoe they are fine. If you are looking to stretch the shoe with pressure they are not fine. I only want to keep my leather smooth so they work fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: aloispd

customer_reviews.title: They work perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for size 8 to 11.5 so far. They fit nice and snug. They do what they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Espejo

customer_reviews.title: Be warned very cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product it fell apart in less than a month. Do yourself a favor avoid these cheaply made shoe stretchers.
customer_reviews.author: torres03

customer_reviews.title: Great price/value. Do exactly what they're designed for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 12. Great price/value for my application, which is to maintain shape, dry out and facilitate a good cleaning and/or shine. Do NOT try to use as shoe stretcher, as they'll break under the requisite stress.
customer_reviews.author: Diogenes

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.  Very poor product
customer_reviews.text: Item broke at very first use. See red arrows on attached photo. Material used is flimsy and not at all sturdy. Good that there is 5 pairs on this order. I only need 4 pairs. I’ll live with not having the 5th pair to use. VERY POOR PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Keep shoes in great shape!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great they really keep my shoes in good shape both at home and during travel in luggage. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bad Quality 2 of the 5 shoe trees came broken. Plastic is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: ken hartman

customer_reviews.title: Product Line is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Have bought many before and will continue to purchase more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Shideler

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Took me a second to figure out how to use them. They're perfect for my Rothy's!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Units are not suitable for a man’s size 12 D shoe or larger
customer_reviews.text: Units are not made for a mans size 12 D shoe, they are too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Hymnself

customer_reviews.title: These are a great, inexpensive shoe tree
customer_reviews.text: These are a great, inexpensive shoe tree. The same ones Reshoevn8r sells for $5/each. The only complaint I have is that the may unsnap a bit too easily. When clean the shoe and holding from the inside a slight tug can unclip it and just get annoying while cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: jd_guthrie

customer_reviews.title: They are very inexpensive but great for keeping your shoes nice
customer_reviews.text: I can't afford a dozen cedar shoetrees, but these are great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Desi Lou

customer_reviews.title: started out great but plastic tree not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: plastic tree not sturdy. Still manage to use them but wouldn't buy them again. If the tree material was stronger they'd be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joe Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Check your purchases; possible product defect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, and price...much cheaper solution, but just as functional as the cedar shoehorns. Unfortunately 1 of the 5 was broken upon arrival, so very disappointed as this was my second purchase of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dolan

customer_reviews.title: That was the worst order I ever purchase
customer_reviews.text: That was the worst order I ever purchase, they off as soon as you put in your shoes. Never will I purchase anything from them I wish I could return everyone that broke on me, I wouldn't refer anyone for this item. They are very weak for any shoes
customer_reviews.author: iceman

customer_reviews.title: Almost good
customer_reviews.text: These do not work with my mens 11.5 shoes. At least not any of mine. One them came broken. I gifted them to my wife and they seem to work better in a women's size 9 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: so good. I am using to stretch out a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I am using to stretch out a couple of leather shoes that are a bit too tight.
customer_reviews.author: WR

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, might need modification
customer_reviews.text: ON TIME, Product is As Advertised BUT for some shoes like Boots; etc. rounded heel base needed to be modified by either reversing Or trimming
customer_reviews.author: William R. Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: They brake really easily
customer_reviews.text: Had two break on me the day I got them just me very careful with them or spend I little more money and get the wooden ones
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great product, decent price
customer_reviews.text: This product is useful and cheap. Can’t find a more suitable one if I didn’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Colin Z

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good. Can’t beat the ones made out of wood. But for your buck..... it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Prado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I will order more next month. Very useful and the price is a steal. Amazon has the best prices. Save your money and shop for these. Thank you again!!!! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are very flimsy. They break very easily. I wouldn’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Kincer

customer_reviews.text: It's quite decent, isn't the sturdiest but it does it's job
customer_reviews.author: Nave

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use and comes with multiple pairs! I love putting these in my shoes because they’re so easy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product GREAT Price
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for a GREAT price meet my expectations and more will be buying more for sure soon for my sneakers!! RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Tinajero

customer_reviews.title: Several pieces received broken
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept. But several pieces received broken on arrival (
customer_reviews.author: Propeller

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight shoe tree
customer_reviews.text: These trees are great. Very light so perfect for traveling. Great price
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it like this product and i've been looking for one. However, I found a better alternative at Ikea!
customer_reviews.author: Carlo V. Principio

customer_reviews.title: They Do The Job
customer_reviews.text: Have a set for each pair of shoes I own
customer_reviews.author: Stoneyrjg

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy shoe tree. Satisfied for the price and quality. Left shoe tree and right shoe tree are the same though
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Product did not fit my shoes as advertised. Very difficult to adjust into the shoe. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan James Aguillon

customer_reviews.title: Decent bang for ya buck
customer_reviews.text: Great product does what it is supposed to do and much better than IKEA one's. Only problem i had was if you force it in, the plastic breaks or gets bent in an awkward position and no longer is secure. Other than that it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Najm Duran

product_meta.title: B&E LIFE 2 Pairs Practical Plastic Adjustable Length Men Tree Shoe Stretcher Boot Holder (2 Pairs Black)
product_meta.description:
